title: A Request and a Thank You
detail_text: <:th_ch0209/>You want me to update the app we’re using on Nijigaku?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Yes. Setsuna-san gave a suggestion the other day that I would like to incorporate. I thought it was a very good idea, so<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I see. Chan I see the current one right now?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Of course. It’s on this USB drive, I was wondering if you could check if the idea is feasible or not?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Got it, leave it to me. Rina-chan’s board「Determined」<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Also, si-....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Hm?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Since you listened to my request, is it okay for me to thank you? Kotori-chan introduced me to a delicious sweet sake shop. Would you like to go there with me after school today?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>! I’m happy. But.... I haven't done anything yet. Is that okay?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Of course part of it is a thank you, but I also want to go with you, Rina-san....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
